message:
In honor of National Human Trafficking Awareness Day, we are proud to announce the launching of ERASE’s Blue Initiative. We are teaming up with The Human Trafficking Investigations & Training Institute to provide law enforcement, Advanced Training in the fight against Human Trafficking. Our inaugural class will be in Aventura, FL later this month. 
#NationalHumanTraffickingAwarenessDay #Education 
For additional information~ http://www.erasechildtrafficking.org/go/blueinitiative
